Name: Retro War
About the game: Retro War is a 2D shooting videogame developed by Madirex. In this game you must pilot a ship, dodge obstacles and enemy ships to finally reach your destination and move to the next level. The game has different popups (unique powers) with which you can gain an advantage. Every 5 levels you have to face a powerful boss. In total there are 80 different levels.
Meta Title: Retro War: Jul 17, 2020, Madirex and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Retro War? Check out the release date (Jul 17, 2020), developer insights from Madirex, and a complete game summary.
